title: Royal Challengers Bengaluru
summary: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) is a franchise cricket team that plays in the Indian Premier League (IPL). Based in Bengaluru, Karnataka, the team was founded in 2008 and is known for its passionate fan base and exciting brand of cricket. RCB has featured several world-class players over the years, including Virat Kohli, AB de Villiers, and Chris Gayle. Despite strong performances, the team has yet to win an IPL title but has been runners-up multiple times.
